titleStmt.title: Newnams nightcrowe A bird that breedeth braules in many families and housholdes. Wherein is remembred that kindely and prouident regard which fathers ought to haue towards their sonnes. Together with a diciphring of the iniurious dealinges of some younger sorte of stepdames.
titleStmt.author: Newnham, John.

notesStmt.note: D4v has a paragraph mark at foot. Variant: D4r has a cancel page pasted over original page, which has seven more lines; no paragraph mark on verso.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
